title: LIC Housing Finance edges higher after profit jump as CLSA retains buy and expects 44% upside - Moneycontrol
content: LIC Housing Finance edges higher after profit jump as CLSA retains buy and expects 44% upside  Moneycontrol
description: The financier on May 18 reported a nearly threefold year on year jump in profit after tax (PAT) to Rs 1,118.64 crore on lower provisions and improvement in collection efficiencies.
